I highly recommend everyone to look up the word "Aryan", its origins and how cumskins stole the word and turned into a synonym for white people in the Western world. The best way to explain this - the Westerners are thieving rats.

It's an Iranian word that was invented by them and has only been used by them as an ethnocultural self-designation since ancient times. Those who speak an Iranian language and belong to the Iranian ethnic stock. There is no evidence that anyone outside the Iranian world used the word. Iranian literally means Aryan because Iran translates to "Land of Aryans", which can be first attested in the Avesta as "Airyanam" (the Avesta was written in Avestan, an Iranian language that was spoken in northeastern greater Iran).

In the 19th century, cumskins stole the Iranian endonym and used it as a synonym for white people.
